summary: Avalanche Sharks tells the story of a bikini contest that turns into a horrifying affair when it is hit by a shark avalanche.
cast: Alexander Mendeluk|Kate Nauta|Benjamin Easterday|Eric Scott Woods|Kelle Cantwell|Richard Gleason|Gina Holden|Jack Cullison|James Ouimet|Nicole Helen|Emily Addison|Mike Ruggieri|Erin Ross|Patrizia Cavaliere|Matt Gunther|Richie Million Jr.|Vinny Petengail|Erika Jordan|John Hundrieser|Amy Ninh|Haley Stewart|Mike Kennedy|Brett Reed|Mika Brooks|Charles Evans Jr.|Abby Francis|Ryan Przestrzleski|Jonathan Widen|Spencer Brennan|Chris Prange|Blake Reistad
title: Avalanche Sharks
